text:
Ralph Northam closed all churches & made it illegal to attend service in Virginia

It’s now punishable by up to 12 months in prison and/or a $2,500 fine

Do you know what’s NOT closed?

Planned Parenthoods in Virginia.

Not to mention liquor stores.

These are Democrat priorities
